Value and uncertainty comment: As stated in Section 2.4.1, the ammonia output of the plant is measured in units of its lower heating value.
This source claims 3.1 MJ/kg electricity denand for the ASU. Assuming a nitrogen demand of 0.84 tonnes per tonne of ammonia, this amounts of an electricity demand of 3.1×0.85 GJ per tonne of ammonia.
According to this source, a heat duty of 103.54 MW is required for a daily production of 1202.6 tonnes, which is amounts to 24×103.54 MWh / 1202.6 t.
